newsitem.title: USA: WinStar, NYNEX enter phone pact.
newsitem.headline: WinStar, NYNEX enter phone pact.

text.p: Winstar Communications Inc and NYNEX Corp said on Thursday they have signed an interconnect agreement that allows WinStar to compete against NYNEX in Massachusetts.
WinStar is already offering competitive local telecommunications services in New York, as a reseller, and plans to initiate service in Boston next month, the companies said in a joint statement.
